parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page. Valid values:

*   **30**
*   **50**
*   **100**

Default value: 30.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

> You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs. For information about how to obtain the ID of a resource group, see [View basic information of a resource group](~~151181~~).

parameters.name: SearchValue
parameters.description:
The keyword used to filter instances, which can be an instance ID or instance description.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the information about all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region, including instance IDs and instance descriptions.
